name: add logo
desc: Place a logo or other graphic object in the Viewer's non-transformable overlay.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Size
properties.desc: Specify the width and height of the image in percentage of screen height.

properties.name: Anchor Point
properties.desc: The Anchor Point determines where to place the legend, and which point on the legend to base placement on.

properties.name: Overlay
properties.desc: The Overlay control allows the user to put the logo behind the model or in front of it.
